question:
[Beverly] went shoe shopping with her sister [Janet]. [Norman] met his wife [Florence] for dinner. [Norman]'s daughter [Janet] stayed home to study. [James]'s wife, [Dorothy], was thrilled to learn she was pregnant. [James] was having trouble with his divorce because he only got to see his daughter [Helen] a few times a week [Dorothy] went to the mall, because she wanted to look for a present for her daughter, [Florence].
Question: How is [Beverly] related to [Helen]?
